column4: Five years after the end of highschool Bob organized a reunion to show others how cool he has turned out.
But the problem was...
only 3 of his classmates turned up that were never really close.
So it was really awkward.
You start walking towards the cottage. Which way do you go?
column5: long way with a nice view

column4: You hear a sound coming from the bushes. What do you do?
When you enter the cottage you can hear the backdoor slam. What do you do?
column6: ignore it and go have dinner

column4: What do you have for dinner?
Murderer rolls a rock at you. Bradlei Bob and Sam die. What does Rachel do?
column5: has a snack to calm her nerves

column4: A wild dog approaches Rachel and beggs for a snack. What does she do?
column6: give the good boy a snack

column4: Murderer attacks Rachel with a baseball bat and kills her
Murderer attacks Rachel with a baseball bat but the dog protects her and she runs away.
After eating everyone goes to unpack. Bob gets stabbed to death and Sam finds his body.
Rachel doesn't want spaghetti so she has a burger instead. The spaghetti was poisoned so everyone else dies. What does she do?
Sam tells others and they decide to run away and get help.
Rachel finds Sam and Bob. What does she do?
column6: use the opportunity to get with Bradlei

column4: Rachel and Bradei run to the phone to call help but the murderer catches them and ties them up. Luckily he is lactose intolerant and had some cheese so he has to run to the toilet. What do they do?
Rachel slips on the banana that the murderer put on the stairs and dies.
Rachel hears a sound coming from downstairs. What does she do?
column6: leaves the house to get to safety

column4: Rachel approaches Bradei calls him sempaii and tries to kiss him. What does he do?
column6: tells her that he is gay

column4: Rachel got to a bus station but the next bus is coming in a long time. What does she do?
column5: starts walking to the closest town

column4: Sam wakes up and finds Rachel and Bradlei tied up so she unties them. What do they do?
Bradlei runs into Sam who just woke up. She explains him the situation. What do they do?
Rachel eats cold leftover spaghetti from sadness but the spaghetti was poisoned so she dies. Go see what Bradlei is doing.
The chairs that they were tied to trip over hit a lantern that breaks and sets the cottage on fire. Everyone burns to death.
The murderer attacks Rachel with a sharpened stick. What does she do?
The murderer kills Rachel with a sharpened stick.
They found the murderer at the toilet reading a magazine. How do they take him down?
They find Rachel dead so they decide to run away. Which path do they take?
The murderer finds them. He grabs Sam and puts a pizza cutter to her neck. What does Bradlei do?
Rachel chops the murderer's head off with her katana. She gets to the town and survives.
Bradlei escapes from the murderer. He reaches the bus on time and survives.
Murderer appears with a huge axe. What do they do?
column6: run into the woods to hide

column4: Sam and Bradlei got lost in the woods and froze to death. Nobody survived.
The murderer is too strong so he kills both Sam and Bradlei. Nobody survived.
They want to call help but the murderer cut the phone wire. Who should they send to get help while the others take care of the murderer?
Rachel got help. The police picked up Sam and Bradlei from the cottage and arrested the murderer.
When Sam and Bradlei leave the murderer seduces Rachel into letting him go and kills her by stabbing a straw into her neck.
Sam and Bradlei overpowered the murderer and killed him with his axe. They got to safety and survived.
They find the back door unlocked and there are fresh footprints in the snow. Someone is definitely here with them. What do they do?
column5: lock the door and stay inside

column4: Out of nowhere the electricity stops working. What do you do now?
column5: find some candles and continue setteling down

column4: You hear a sound coming from the behind you. What do you do?
Where do you want to head to?
You reached the river. Which way do you want to go now?
Bob slips falls on a rock and dies. Do you want to change the way you are going?
The ice breaks under Bob and he drowns. Do you wanna change the way you are going?
column6: Go back and follow the river

column4: You reached the town and everyone survived.
Your jump triggered an avalanche and it killed everyone.
You got back to the path. How fast do you want to go?
The murderer found you and sent bunch of human eating geese at you. Everyone got eaten by the geese.
You reached the town. Bradlei Rachel and Sam survived.
You reached the bus stop but the next bus is in an hour. What do you do?
column5: starts walking to the closest town

column4: The murderer finds you. What do you do?
Rachel pulled out her katana and choped the murderers head off. Sam Bradlei and Rachel then reached the town and survived.
Which way do you want to go?
Should you separate so the faster group can go get help?
You should never leave your friends behind. Sam and Rachel got lost and froze to death even though Bradlei reached the town and survived.
Rachel catches up to Bradlei
You get stuck on a cliff. What do you do?
The mountain is too slippery so you slide back down.
